item.title: ğŸ”´ 23:03 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivsk territorial community. Take cover!
item.description: ğŸ”´ 23:03 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivsk territorial community. Take cover! #Chervonohryhorivsk_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
